metadata.title: CVE-2024-42312 linux-6.1
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  sysctl: always initialize i_uid/i_gid  Always initialize i_uid/i_gid inside the sysfs core so set_ownership() can safely skip setting them.  Commit 5ec27ec735ba ("fs/proc/proc_sysctl.c: fix the default values of i_uid/i_gid on /proc/sys inodes.") added defaults for i_uid/i_gid when set_ownership() was not implemented. It also missed adjusting net_ctl_set_ownership() to use the same default values in case the computation of a better value failed.
